Articles.Content: The mission: got to the mun with a saturne V with the S-IC the S-II the SIV-B the LEM the service modul with a  and the command modul with a vector engine ,the command modul and the detachable docking port of command modul and launche escape system. The rocket must be at scale . 3 kerbaunot in the command modul.The stage must be in the order of the real mission apollo 11. GOODLUCK.

Welcome to the forums!

This is an interesting challenge idea, but perhaps players will need more information.

You seem to be referencing very specific parts/modules; are they from a mod perhaps? You should clarify that this mod is required and link it. Do you just want players to make a stock-alike reproduction? If so you may want to specify what exactly the rules of that entail.

Rocket In My Pocket sorry for the impécision of my challenge . For the saturne V you do make  with spécifique part . The S-IC you do have a 5 mainsail engine or 5 rhino engine  ,the S-II do has 5 vector engine and the command modul be has the  a hig gain antenna on the service modul and the LEM be has a form of a hexagone with the structural placke and the parachut must be under the docking port and the docking port must be jetison at a moment in the mission ( I have researche in google while 1 hours )and the service modul be has a skipper engine and has a grey fuel tank and 4 rcs thruster that's all the rest  be reproduct better than you can the S-IC and the S be more bigger than the S-II be more bigger than the S-IVB and the S-IVB be most bigger than the service modul.

The LEM protection be separate in 4 when  comlumbia is separate of S-IVB.
and I forgot  the kerbal must be has g force limit
The challenge is, in other words, to recreate Apollo 11 in stock, but with some requirements.
